author: bjh
msg: Enable EXTRA_LIBS when linking OS/2 dlls

author: bjh
msg: Provide system error messages instead of just OS/2 error codes for dynamic
linking errors. I don't particularly like using static char buffers like
this but ap_os_dso_error() doesn't take a pool.

author: dgaudet
msg: loop around on EINTR from semop()

author: dougm
msg: Fix configuration engine re-entrant hangups, which solve a
handful of problems seen with mod_perl <Perl> configuration sections
